name: Omnistrate
headline: Transform any software to multi-cloud SaaS in minutes not years
description:
Omnistrate is a cloud platform to SaaS-ify your docker image in minutes instead of years.

Let’s say you have an open-source software, and you want to monetize your invention by building a multi-cloud SaaS solution. You can either spend years doing it yourself or use Omnistrate to do it in no time.

Get started today by simply importing your existing docker-compose.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:cloud-computing; industry:infrastructure; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Kamal Gupta, Founder
founders.description: Kamal is a Co-Founder & CEO of Omnistrate. He is a repeat founder with an entrepreneurial spirit. Kamal led the engineering for Kafka at Confluent across all channels. During his time, Kafka Cloud revenue grew by 20x. Before that, he led the database engineering for AWS Aurora MySQL, a BB+ dollar business managing MM+ of database nodes. During his period at AWS (2007-2020), he built more than half-a-dozen cloud services at AWS across different domains & providers

founders.name: Alok Nikhil, Founder
founders.description: Alok comes with deep technical expertise in Serverless, Networking, Performance on the Cloud. He was the original technical author of Aurora Serverless, which revolutionized the data systems space. Within the first year of its introduction, ~50% of hundreds of thousands of Aurora DBs created were on Aurora Serverless. He also scaled networking (packets-per-second) on AWS by 10-15x during his tenure at Cisco, scaled Confluent Cloud by 5x from 4GBps to 20GBps, and Kafka Cloud latencies by 10x.

### Enable self-serve deployments for your customers, cloud or on-prem, with Day-2 automation

## Use Cases
##### You have an open-source project that you want to provide a managed cloud offering for.
![You have an open-source project that you want to provide a managed cloud offering for.](http://www.omnistrate.com/_next/static/media/UseCase1.ee618a8c.svg)
##### You have a complex app that you want to allow your customers to deploy in their cloud account in a fully-managed way
![You have a complex app that you want to allow your customers to deploy in their cloud account in a fully-managed way](http://www.omnistrate.com/_next/static/media/UseCase2.a9651ecf.svg)
##### You have an app that you want to distribute to air-gapped environments managing your tenants, software licenses, and versions all in one place
![You have an app that you want to distribute to air-gapped environments managing your tenants, software licenses, and versions all in one place](http://www.omnistrate.com/_next/static/media/UseCase3.91c066f2.svg)
##### You want to build your Developer Platform to enable self-serve deployments for application teams, and co-pilot backend operational tasks
![You want to build your Developer Platform to enable self-serve deployments for application teams, and co-pilot backend operational tasks](http://www.omnistrate.com/_next/static/media/UseCase4.d0667dae.svg)
## How Omnistrate works
Bring your Repo
Bring your Image
Bring your AI Model
![Chrome Toolbar](http://www.omnistrate.com/_next/static/media/ChromeToolbar.b820bfa4.svg)
Have Helm, Operator, Kustomize, Terraform? -- No problem! We can import them directly.
## Who is Omnistrate for?
###### Product Owners
Turn your app into a cloud service for your customers to seamlessly deploy, manage, share, observe, and get usage details across cloud or on-premise
###### Developers
Build your tenant-aware cloud service by offloading tenant management, application deployments, ACID-compliant infra management, and automating day-2 operations 
###### DevOps teams
Provides full visibility into the fleet—tracking customer activity, upgrades, health, release versions, infrastructure, margins—enabling proactive management and operations
###### Data science or ML Ops
Push more models to production and provide Data science teams better access to compute while keeping sight on ML workloads
## What it takes to build a SaaS Control plane
Building a "proper" Control Plane is a complex and time-consuming task. It involves managing tenants, building multi-cloud ACID-compliant infrastructure management, enabling tenant-aware application deployments,and automating operations from scaling, patching, security controls, monitoring, durability, observability, alerting, metering and billing with marketplace integrations.
[Read More](http://www.omnistrate.com/<https:/blog.omnistrate.com/posts/52>)
![SaaS Control Plane](http://www.omnistrate.com/_next/static/media/SaaSControlPlane.c24325e9.svg)
## Define it once, run it anywhere
[Get Started for Free](http://www.omnistrate.com/<https:/omnistrate.cloud/signup>)[Become a Partner](http://www.omnistrate.com/</partners>)
###### Anywhere
![Anywhere](http://www.omnistrate.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FTools1.8e318296.png&w=1080&q=75)

###### Any SaaS integration
![Any SaaS integration](http://www.omnistrate.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FTools5.0b718732.png&w=1080&q=75)
###### Any ML Tool & Framework
![Any ML Tool & Framework](http://www.omnistrate.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FTools6.d4274492.png&w=1080&q=75)
## Get started for free nowNo credit card required
[Get Started for Free](http://www.omnistrate.com/<https:/omnistrate.cloud/signup>)
1
###### Bring your software
Easily onboard your application to the platform and get started in minutes.
2
###### Configure your service
Customize settings to align with your specific needs and requirements.
3
###### Pay only for what you use.
Enjoy transparent, usage-based pricing with no hidden costs.
## Our customer stories
M
Michael Cooper
Global GTM Lead, Microsoft Azure
Building a SaaS platform traditionally involves a significant investment of time and resources in undifferentiated tasks. During my time at Confluent, I saw how this process can be overwhelming. Omnistrate's approach to efficiently and affordably converting software into a multi-cloud SaaS offering is a breakthrough. It's a vital service for any SaaS creator seeking to optimize their time and resources
S
Sachin Honnudike
Senior Engineer, Databricks
A solid service control plane is crucial to any technology stack and product. Omnistrate makes it super easy to define, build, and scale a control plane with minimal effort
D
Di Qi
CEO, Lantern
Omnistrate has been instrumental in our journey to monetizing our software. It simplified the complex process of SaaS development, saving us months of infrastructure engineering effort.
S
Subomi Oluwalana
CEO, Convoy
Our friends at another company told us it took them 2 years to build their control plane using Vanilla AWS APIs. Omnistrate enabled us to ship our Cloud platform in only weeks.
A
Anonymous
SVP, Public Database Company
Partnering with Omnistrate was a pivotal decision for our SaaS project. Their offering not only expedited our development process but also ensured a timely launch, allowing us to capitalize on a crucial market opportunity.
A
Anurag Gupta
EX- VP of Database and Analytic Services, AWS
Control planes consume precious headcount for undifferentiated work. Omnistrate is reinventing control planes, making it easy and inexpensive to stand up a managed service on any cloud.
N
Nikhil Gudi
CTO, PeriNimble
At PeriNimble, we are redefining the next generation of Energy and Utilities SaaS software and leveraging Omnistrate has helped us save tons of time and money. Best decision we have made so far
D
Daniel Wasserlauf
CTO, Paigo
Using Omnistrate to manage, deploy and configure SaaS applications in a multi-cloud model is nothing short of remarkable. The work that would take me months now can happen in minutes. I feel as though Omnistrate is a superpower I wish knew about earlier
S
Sailesh Krishnamurthy
Ex- GM of AWS Aurora, AWS
Building a controlplane for stateful systems is hard and can take years to get it right 
D
Dave Lang
Ex- Product Head of RDS, AWS
Building a control plane that is reliable at scale is incredibly difficult. It’s expert-level work that can consume a team’s resources and often requires specialists. Omnistrate is simplifying the process, making it faster, and allowing teams to easily use it across multiple clouds.
M
Mitch Patin
CEO, Inquery
We were able to build our Inquery SaaS within few minutes as opposed to months
A
Anonymous
CEO, Application SaaS Customer
After Omnistrate, we saw a 200% increase in active users, experienced the ease of automated infrastructure, plus self-service account and subscription management
A
Anonymous
CEO, Caching SaaS Cloud Customer
Thanks to Omnistrate, I transformed my SaaS from an idea to a fully operational end-to-end solution in just 60 minutes! The platform’s incredible efficiency and user-friendliness are absolutely revolutionary!
G
Guy Korland
CEO, FalkorDB
Omnistrate dramatically accelerated our GTM, cutting launch time from months to weeks. Their secure platform and exceptional support enabled us to deploy features rapidly and efficiently.
A
Adam
Having gone from limited k8s experience with no idea how we would support a BYOA offering, to now having a cell based architecture that we can deploy anywhere and be confident in our offerings, security posture, and deployment strategy in such a short amount of time really is incredible.
M
Michael Cooper

generated_description:
### Omnistrate: A Cloud Innovation Game Changer

**About the Company**  
Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator Batch W23, Omnistrate is revolutionizing the way software developers transition their applications into the multi-cloud SaaS landscape. Headquartered in Redwood City, CA, the company employs a team of 15 passionate individuals ready to tackle the challenges of modern cloud computing.

**Mission**  
Omnistrate's core mission is straightforward: **to transform any software into a multi-cloud SaaS solution in minutes, not years**. This is essential for creators of open-source software looking to monetize their projects without enduring the long and exhausting processes historically associated with SaaS development.

**How It Works**  
At its heart, Omnistrate allows users to simply import existing Docker images or docker-compose files into its platform. In just minutes, developers can get their applications live and operating in a managed cloud environment. This is not just about speed; it's about enabling self-serve deployments for customers and automating day-two operations, empowering users to focus more on innovation than infrastructure.

**Target Audience**  
Omnistrate caters to several groups:
- **Product Owners** who wish to turn their apps into seamless cloud services.
- **Developers** looking to offload complex tenant management.
- **DevOps Teams** needing full visibility across cloud infrastructures.
- **Data Scientists and ML Ops** professionals wanting easier model deployment.

**Key Features**  
- Rapid onboarding with existing code or images.
- Multi-cloud infrastructure support, including Kubernetes and Terraform integrations.
- Self-service customer portals and automated infrastructure management.
- Transparent, usage-based pricing—users pay only for what they use.

**Customer Success Stories**  
Many users have touted Omnistrate's impact. Notably, it's helped businesses like Convoy reduce months of development work to just weeks and allowed others, like FalkorDB, to cut their time to market dramatically from months to weeks. The platform's efficiency is described as a "superpower" that simplifies the complex orchestration required for robust SaaS solutions.

**Join the Revolution**  
If you're an innovator eager to bring your software to market with unprecedented speed and efficiency, head over to [Omnistrate's website](http://www.omnistrate.com). Take the plunge and transform your application into a multi-cloud SaaS in what feels like seconds, rather than years. Get started for free—no credit card required.

In a world where time is often the biggest barrier to success, Omnistrate is the toolkit every software developer needs, streamlining the path from concept to cloud.
